participant_1.background:
Music is my way to relax and enjoy my time with friends.
i sing in the shower.
i get paid over 5 million a year to dribble a ball.
my wife is a college professor.
regular life disappoints me.

participant_2.background:
I went camping in the mountains and spent the time hiking, fishing, and swimming.
I used to be a singer in a church choir, but I had to quit because of my asthma.
i watch a lot of movies.
i have a 3 year old.
I spent my last birthday with my wife at a fancy restaurant, which was nice, but I would rather have gone to the Galapagos Islands again.

content.text: Hey there!
Hello!
How are you doing today?
I'm doing great! How about you?
I'm doing well, thank you.
That's good to hear.
What did you do last weekend?
I went camping in the mountains with my family.
That sounds like fun! Did you do any hiking, fishing, or swimming?
We did a little bit of everything. We hiked up to a beautiful overlook, went fishing in a nearby stream, and swam in a nearby lake.
That sounds like a great time! I love going camping.
Me too! It's so relaxing to get away from the hustle and bustle of everyday life and just enjoy nature.
I agree. Do you do any other outdoor activities besides camping?
I love to go hiking, fishing, swimming, and kayaking.
Those are all great activities! I love them too.
What's your favorite outdoor activity?
I think I'd have to say hiking. I love being able to see new places and explore nature.
Hiking is great! It's so peaceful and relaxing.
It is. It's also a great way to get exercise.
That's true. I'm glad we're both into outdoor activities. It's always more fun to do them with someone else.
I agree. I love spending time outdoors with friends and family.
Me too! It's a great way to relax and have fun.
I'm glad we're on the same page about outdoor activities.
Me too
